subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
Corruption (Institutional)
organizations: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
lead_paragraph: In framing organized world soccer as an entity overtaken by criminals, the United States has positioned itself as more a savior of soccer than a punitive policeman.
snippet: In framing organized world soccer as an entity overtaken by criminals, the United States has positioned itself as more a savior of soccer than a punitive policeman.
